feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: code
entry.content:
This is a code

#include <stdio.h>
#include <time.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdlib.h>



//creat heals and damage and itemCard and seven rostam khan and boss
    int heals=20;
    char showHeals[]={"<><><><><><><><><><>"};
    int attack=1;
    int khan= 7;
    int boss1= 20;
    int boss2= 30;
    int boss3= 45;
    int boss4= 60;
    int boss5= 75;
    int boss6= 95;
    int boss7= 120;
    const char *card[8]={"attack+1","attack+2","attack+3","attack+4","heal+1","heal+2","heal+3","heal+4"};
    int at_he[8]={0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7};
    int choosCard;
////creat heals and damage and itemCard and seven rostam khan and boss


int loading(int x) {

    for (int i=1; i<=x; i++ ) {

        printf("\r.  ");
        usleep(300000);
        printf("\r.. ");
        usleep(300000);
        printf("\r...");
        usleep(300000);
        printf("\r   ");
        usleep(300000);

    }
    printf("\r");

}
////loading
//typeing word 
//'sent' is used as a shorthand for 'sentence' throughout this code.
int typing(char sent[],int pause,int pauseEnd) {

    for (int i=0; sent[i]!='\0'; i++) {

        printf("%c",sent[i]);
        usleep(pause);

    }
    //printf("\n");
    usleep(pauseEnd);

}
////typeing word 

//update attack and heart
//'atheUp' is used as a shorthand for 'attack and heart Update' throughout this code.
int atheUp(int num1,int num2,int num3) {

    if (choosCard==1) {

        if(num1==0) {
            attack+=1;
            printf("now attack is: %d\n",attack);
        }else if (num1==1) {
            attack+=2;
            printf("now attack is: %d\n",attack);
        }else if (num1==2) {
            attack+=3;
            printf("now attack is: %d\n",attack);
        }else if (num1==3) {
            attack+=4;
            printf("now attack is: %d\n",attack);
        }else if (num1==4) {
            heals+=1;
            printf("now heart is: %d\n",heals);
        }else if (num1==5) {
            heals+=2;
            printf("now heart is: %d\n",heals);
        }else if (num1==6) {
            heals+=3;
            printf("now heart is: %d\n",heals);
        }else if (num1==7) {
            heals+=4;
            printf("now heart is: %d\n",heals);
        }
    }

    if (choosCard==2) {

        if(num2==0) {
            attack+=1;
            printf("now attack is: %d\n",attack);
        }else if (num2==1) {
            attack+=2;
            printf("now attack is: %d\n",attack);
        }else if (num2==2) {
            attack+=3;
            printf("now attack is: %d\n",attack);
        }else if (num2==3) {
            attack+=4;
            printf("now attack is: %d\n",attack);
        }else if (num2==4) {
            heals+=1;
            printf("now heart is: %d\n",heals);
        }else if (num2==5) {
            heals+=2;
            printf("now heart is: %d\n",heals);
        }else if (num2==6) {
            heals+=3;
            printf("now heart is: %d\n",heals);
        }else if (num2==7) {
            heals+=4;
            printf("now heart is: %d\n",heals);
        }
            
    }

    if (choosCard==3) {

        if(num3==0) {
            attack+=1;
            printf("now attack is: %d\n",attack);
        }else if (num3==1) {
            attack+=2;
            printf("now attack is: %d\n",attack);
        }else if (num3==2) {
            attack+=3;
            printf("now attack is: %d\n",attack);
        }else if (num3==3) {
            attack+=4;
            printf("now attack is: %d\n",attack);
        }else if (num3==4) {
            heals+=1;
            printf("now heart is: %d\n",heals);
        }else if (num3==5) {
            heals+=2;
            printf("now heart is: %d\n",heals);
        }else if (num3==6) {
            heals+=3;
            printf("now heart is: %d\n",heals);
        }else if (num3==7) {
            heals+=4;
            printf("now heart is: %d\n",heals);
        }
            
    }

}

int sshadow(char sent[],int pause,int pauseEnd) {

    int i=0;
    sent[0];

    for (i; sent[i]!='\0'; i++) {

        printf("%c",sent[i]);
        usleep(pause);

    }
    //printf("\n");
    
    usleep(pauseEnd);
    printf("\rShadow:                                                                         \r");
    printf("\rShadow:");
}







int main() {

    int attackBoss= (rand()%3)+1;

    srand(time(0));

//wlcome
    char name[30];
    printf("enter your name: ");
    scanf("%s",name);
    
    loading(1);

    printf("Hy %s\n",name);

    loading(2);
    char shadow[6]={'s','h','a','d','o','w'};
    printf("I`m a ");
    for (int i=0; i<=5; i++) {

        printf("%c",shadow[i]);
        usleep(200000);

    }
    
    usleep(300000);

    printf("\nshadow: are you ready 'yes/no':");
    char yes_no[4];
    scanf("%s",yes_no);
////welcom

    if(yes_no[0]=='n' && yes_no[1]=='o') {

        for (int i=1; i<=1; i++) {

            loading(2);

            char off[]={"game is off"};
            typing(off,80000,0);
            break;

        }
    }

    if (yes_no[0]=='y' && yes_no[1]=='e' && yes_no[2]=='s') {
    
    
        for (int i=1; i<=20; i++ ) {

            printf("|");
            usleep(100000);
        }
    
        printf("\n");
        printf(" game is complited");


//Description1
        printf("\n\n"); 
        loading(3);
        char speak1[]={"shadow: So let's start..."};
        typing(speak1,50000,500000);
        char speak2[]={"At the beginning of the game, you have only 10 hearts and 1 attack."};
        typing(speak2,50000,500000);
        char speak3[]={"\nshadow: which will be displayed like this in the rest of the game:\n"};
        typing(speak3,50000,0);
        char speak4[]={"heart:"};
        typing(speak4,50000,300000);
        printf(" <><><><><><><><><><>\n");
        usleep(300000);
        char speak5[]={"attack:"};
        typing(speak5,50000,300000);
        printf(" 1\n");
////Description1

//Description2
        usleep(500000);
        char start[]={"\nshadow: Enter 'Start' to start the game:"};
        typing(start,50000,0);
////Description2

        char startGame[6];
        scanf("%s",startGame);

        usleep(rand() %5);
        printf("\n");

        if (startGame[0]=='s' && startGame[1]=='t' && startGame[2]=='a' && startGame[3]=='r' && startGame[4]=='t') {

            for (int i=1; i<=10; i++) {

                int one1=at_he[rand() % 6];
                int two1=at_he[rand() % 6];
                int three1=at_he[rand() % 6];
                

                printf("cards: (1)%s (2)%s (3)%s\n", card[one1], card[two1], card[three1]);
                //printf("your number: %d %d %d", at_he[one1], at_he[two1], at_he[three1]);

                char enterCard[]={"\nenter a number: "};
                typing(enterCard,30000,500000);
                scanf("%d",&choosCard);

                usleep(500000);
                printf("\n");

                atheUp(one1,two1,three1);

                

                if (i==1) {

                    printf("Shadow:");
                    char khan11[]={" Well, let's go to the first khan"};
                    sshadow(khan11,50000,700000);
                    
                    char khan12[]={" Confronting the Savage Lion"};
                    sshadow(khan12,50000,700000);
                    
                    char khan13[]={" A realm where the untamed wilderness tests the strength of any who dare enter.\n"};
                    sshadow(khan13,50000,700000);

                    if (boss1>0 && heals>0) {

                        loading(2);
                        char fight[]={"now Fight\n"};
                        typing(fight,50000,300000);

                        printf("\nheart: ");
                        for (int i=0; i<=heals; i++) {
                            
                            printf("%c",showHeals[i]);

                        }

                        printf ("\nattack: %d\n\n",attack);

                        while (boss1>0 && heals>0) {

                            attackBoss= (rand()%3)+1;

                            boss1-=attack;
                            
                            heals-=attackBoss;

                            
                            printf("You have now dealt %d damage to the boss and now he has %d heart.\n",attack,boss1);
                            printf("Now the boss has dealt you %d damage.",attackBoss);
                            printf("\nyour heart: ");
                            for (int i=0; i<=heals; i++) {
                            
                                printf("%c",showHeals[i]);
                                usleep(80000);
                                

                            }
                            printf("\n");

                            sleep(2);

                        }
                    }else{

                        char win[]={"\nYOU LOSE\n"};
                        typing(win,90000,100000);
                        loading(2);     

                    }

                    if(boss1<=0) {

                        char win[]={"\nYOU WIN\n"};
                        typing(win,90000,100000);
                        loading(2);
                        
                    }

                
                }

                if (i==2) {

                    printf("shadow:");
                    char speak6[]={"Well, let's go to the first khan"};

                }

                if (i==3) {

                    printf("shadow:");
                    char speak6[]={"Well, let's go to the first khan"};

                }

                if (i==4) {

                    printf("shadow:");
                    char speak6[]={"Well, let's go to the first khan"};

                }

                if (i==5) {

                    printf("shadow:");
                    char speak6[]={"Well, let's go to the first khan"};

                }

                if (i==6) {

                    printf("shadow:");
                    char speak6[]={"Well, let's go to the first khan"};

                }

                if (i==7) {

                    printf("shadow:");
                    char speak6[]={"Well, let's go to the first khan"};

                }
            }
        }
    }
}
